# 逻辑即时表现平滑纠偏方案 (2025-12-12 05:20Z)

_**User**_

接下来我会发 gpt 与我讨论出来的移动平滑方案，你先看一下 下面给你一个 完整、工程可直接落地、变量命名清晰、每个字段都有解释的方案。
它可以完美解决：
逻辑层即时处理（不缓存）
表现层独立移动、低延迟
逻辑突变导致表现走偏的问题
表现层自动回到逻辑轨道
出现你说的“表现层移动方向可能要转 100°”的情形
不抖、不跳、不穿帮
方案包含 逻辑层结构 + 表现层组件（Unity C#）+ 变量解释 + 扩展点。

✅ 最终完整方案：逻辑即时，表现平滑纠偏

1. 变量说明（全局一致）
逻辑层变量（来自服务器或回滚）
变量名类型含义
posLogic
Vector3
逻辑层权威位置（瞬时更新）
dirLogic
Vector3
逻辑层期望移动方向（单位向量）
speedLogic
float
逻辑层移动速度
逻辑层无需平滑，也不存在预测。

表现层内部状态（本组件维护）
变量名类型含义
posVisual
Vector3
表现层位置（用于渲染，不等于逻辑位置）
dirVisual
Vector3
表现层当前移动方向（平滑逼近）
speedVisual
float
表现层当前速度（平滑逼近）
表现层相当于一个“带滞后纠偏的物理体”。

纠偏参数（核心）
变量名类型含义
wLogicDirection
float
逻辑方向在合成移动方向中的权重，越大越听逻辑
wCorrectionDirection
float
回到逻辑路径的纠偏方向权重，解决“轨道偏移”
posFixLerp
float
表现与逻辑位置的微小拉扯速度，用于长期误差消散
accel
float
表现层的加速度（速度平滑）

2. 完整 Unity 可直接使用组件（含详细注释）
using UnityEngine;

/// <summary>
/// 表现层移动控制：
/// - 逻辑层瞬时更新（不平滑）
/// - 表现层自主沿移动方向运动，并根据逻辑方向 + 纠偏方向进行矫正
/// - 自动回到逻辑路径，不抖、不跳、不瞬移
/// </summary>
public class VisualMovement : MonoBehaviour
{
    // ================================
    // 逻辑层输入（来自服务器或回滚）
    // ================================
    
    /// <summary>逻辑层权威位置（瞬时变化，不平滑）</summary>
    public Vector3 posLogic;

    /// <summary>逻辑层权威移动方向（单位向量）</summary>
    public Vector3 dirLogic;

    /// <summary>逻辑层速度（瞬时变化）</summary>
    public float speedLogic;


    // ================================
    // 表现层内部状态（本组件维护）
    // ================================
    
    /// <summary>表现层当前渲染的位置</summary>
    private Vector3 posVisual;

    /// <summary>表现层当前移动方向（用于移动计算）</summary>
    private Vector3 dirVisual;

    /// <summary>表现层当前移动速度</summary>
    private float speedVisual;


    // ================================
    // 参数（可调）
    // ================================

    [Header("权重系数（方向合成）")]

    /// <summary>
    /// 在表现移动方向中，逻辑方向的权重。
    /// 越大越紧贴逻辑方向（过大容易突变）
    /// </summary>
    public float wLogicDirection = 1.0f;

    /// <summary>
    /// 在表现移动方向中，用于纠偏的方向权重。
    /// 越大越快回到逻辑路径（解决走偏问题）
    /// </summary>
    public float wCorrectionDirection = 0.3f;


    [Header("位置与速度平滑")]

    /// <summary>表现速度平滑逼近逻辑速度时的加速度</summary>
    public float accel = 10f;

    /// <summary>表现位置向逻辑位置的微小拉回（长期同步）</summary>
    public float posFixLerp = 0.5f;


    // ================================
    // 初始化
    // ================================
    void Start()
    {
        posVisual = transform.position;
        dirVisual = dirLogic;
        speedVisual = speedLogic;
    }


    // ================================
    // 每帧更新（表现层）
    // ================================
    void Update()
    {
        float dt = Time.deltaTime;

        // 1. 速度平滑逼近逻辑速度
        speedVisual = Mathf.MoveTowards(speedVisual, speedLogic, accel * dt);

        // 2. 纠偏方向：表现位置朝逻辑位置的方向
        Vector3 correctionDir = (posLogic - posVisual).normalized;

        // 3. 合成最终移动方向（核心逻辑）
        Vector3 dirMove =
            dirLogic * wLogicDirection +
            correctionDir * wCorrectionDirection;

        if (dirMove.sqrMagnitude < 0.0001f)
            dirMove = dirLogic; // 避免零向量

        dirMove.Normalize();

        // 将合成方向更新到表现方向（供调试或模型朝向使用）
        dirVisual = dirMove;

        // 4. 表现移动：完全用表现自己的方向和速度
        posVisual += dirVisual * speedVisual * dt;

        // 5. 轻微拉回逻辑位置（避免累计误差）
        posVisual = Vector3.Lerp(posVisual, posLogic, posFixLerp * dt);

        // 6. 应用到渲染
        transform.position = posVisual;
    }


    // ================================
    // 供逻辑层调用（每当收到权威帧时）
    // ================================
    public void ApplyLogicState(Vector3 newPos, Vector3 newDir, float newSpeed)
    {
        posLogic = newPos;
        dirLogic = newDir.normalized;
        speedLogic = newSpeed;
    }
}


3. 为何此方案能完美解决你说的“表现层必须转 100°”问题
当表现层走偏时：
dirLogic = 90° 方向
correctionDir = 朝向逻辑位置，方向 ≠ 90°

合成后的移动方向：
dirMove = Normalize( dirLogic * w1 + correctionDir * w2 )

这个 dirMove 的角度可能是：
95°
110°
120°
140°
取决于表现位置相对逻辑位置偏离多少。
完全达成你说的目标：
“表现层的移动方向（不是角色朝向）会根据逻辑方向变化，同时包含纠偏方向，因此会比逻辑方向多转”。
✔ 不会永远对不齐
✔ 不会抖动
✔ 路径自动光滑接回逻辑轨迹
✔ 插值方向与位置严格同步，不出现方向对不上位移方向的问题

4. 参数推荐值（实际项目经验）
参数推荐范围作用
wLogicDirection = 1.0
1.0–2.0
提高听命逻辑的程度
wCorrectionDirection = 0.2 ~ 0.4
0.2–0.5
轨迹偏移纠正强度
accel = 10
5–20
速度变化平滑性
posFixLerp = 0.3
0.1–1.0
长期误差微调

5. 如果你还需要，我可以继续提供：
模型朝向（不是移动方向）的单独平滑方案
位移技能、冲刺、击退如何加入
结合预测/回滚的完整流水线
多人交互与碰撞一致性处理方法
可插拔 Unity Component 包（可直接使用）
只要告诉我你要继续扩展哪一部分。

制定集成计划：

<tool-use data-tool-type="unknown" data-tool-name="create_plan">
<details>
<summary>Tool use: **create_plan**</summary>


Parameters:

```json
{
  "plan": "# 移动平滑方案集成计划\n\n## 目标\n将提供的移动平滑方案集成到 &#96;TransViewComponent&#96;，替换现有的插值移动逻辑，实现：\n- 逻辑层即时更新（不缓存）\n- 表现层独立移动、低延迟\n- 自动纠偏回到逻辑轨道\n- 解决\"表现层移动方向转 100°\"的问题\n\n## 现有架构分析\n\n### 逻辑层\n- &#96;TransComponent&#96;: 存储位置（TSVector）和旋转（TSQuaternion）\n- &#96;MovementComponent&#96;: 存储速度（FP）\n- &#96;MovementCapability&#96;: 处理移动逻辑，直接更新 &#96;TransComponent.Position&#96;\n\n### 表现层\n- &#96;TransViewComponent&#96;: 负责同步逻辑层位置到表现层\n  - 当前使用插值模式（&#96;UpdateVisualFollowInterpolation&#96;）\n  - 支持 RootMotion 模式（技能动作时）\n  - 使用 &#96;Vector3.SmoothDamp&#96; 或简单插值\n\n## 实现方案\n\n### 1. 修改 TransViewComponent 核心移动逻辑\n\n**文件**: &#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Components/TransViewComponent.cs&#96;\n\n#### 1.1 添加表现层内部状态变量\n&#96;&#96;&#96;csharp\n// 表现层内部状态（本组件维护）\nprivate Vector3 posVisual;           // 表现层位置（用于渲染）\nprivate Vector3 dirVisual;          // 表现层当前移动方向（平滑逼近）\nprivate float speedVisual;           // 表现层当前速度（平滑逼近）\n\n// 逻辑层输入（从逻辑层计算）\nprivate Vector3 posLogic;            // 逻辑层权威位置\nprivate Vector3 dirLogic;            // 逻辑层期望移动方向（单位向量）\nprivate float speedLogic;             // 逻辑层移动速度\n\n// 用于计算逻辑方向的历史位置\nprivate Vector3 lastLogicPosForDir;  // 上一帧逻辑位置（用于计算方向）\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n#### 1.2 添加纠偏参数（Inspector 可调）\n&#96;&#96;&#96;csharp\n[Header(\"移动平滑参数\")]\n[Tooltip(\"逻辑方向在合成移动方向中的权重，越大越听逻辑\")]\npublic float wLogicDirection = 1.0f;\n\n[Tooltip(\"回到逻辑路径的纠偏方向权重，解决轨道偏移\")]\npublic float wCorrectionDirection = 0.3f;\n\n[Tooltip(\"表现速度平滑逼近逻辑速度时的加速度\")]\npublic float accel = 10f;\n\n[Tooltip(\"表现位置向逻辑位置的微小拉回（长期同步）\")]\npublic float posFixLerp = 0.5f;\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n#### 1.3 实现核心移动更新逻辑\n替换 &#96;UpdateVisualFollowInterpolation&#96; 方法，实现新方案：\n- 从 &#96;TransComponent&#96; 获取 &#96;posLogic&#96;\n- 从 &#96;MovementComponent&#96; 获取 &#96;speedLogic&#96;\n- 根据位置变化计算 &#96;dirLogic&#96;（需要记录上一帧位置）\n- 实现方向合成：&#96;dirMove = Normalize(dirLogic * wLogicDirection + correctionDir * wCorrectionDirection)&#96;\n- 表现层自主移动：&#96;posVisual += dirVisual * speedVisual * dt&#96;\n- 轻微拉回：&#96;posVisual = Lerp(posVisual, posLogic, posFixLerp * dt)&#96;\n\n#### 1.4 适配 TrueSync 类型转换\n- &#96;TSVector&#96; → &#96;Vector3&#96;: &#96;new Vector3((float)tsVec.x, (float)tsVec.y, (float)tsVec.z)&#96;\n- &#96;FP&#96; → &#96;float&#96;: &#96;(float)fpValue&#96;\n\n### 2. 保留现有功能\n\n#### 2.1 RootMotion 模式\n- 保留 &#96;UpdateVisualFollowRootMotion&#96; 方法\n- 技能动作时继续使用 RootMotion 模式\n- 非技能动作时使用新的平滑移动方案\n\n#### 2.2 旋转逻辑\n- 保留 &#96;UpdateRotationFromLogic&#96; 方法\n- 旋转逻辑不受影响\n\n#### 2.3 OnReset 方法\n- 更新 &#96;OnReset&#96; 以初始化新的表现层状态变量\n- 确保回滚时正确重置\n\n### 3. 初始化逻辑\n\n在 &#96;OnInitialize&#96; 中：\n- 初始化 &#96;posVisual&#96; 为当前逻辑位置\n- 初始化 &#96;dirVisual&#96; 为逻辑方向（或零向量）\n- 初始化 &#96;speedVisual&#96; 为逻辑速度\n- 初始化 &#96;lastLogicPosForDir&#96; 用于方向计算\n\n### 4. 方向计算逻辑\n\n实现 &#96;CalculateLogicDirection&#96; 方法：\n- 比较当前逻辑位置和上一帧逻辑位置\n- 计算方向向量并归一化\n- 如果位移太小（阈值），使用上一帧方向或零向量\n\n### 5. 代码结构\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;csharp\n// 在 UpdateVisualFollowInterpolation 中：\nvoid UpdateVisualFollowInterpolation(float deltaTime)\n{\n    // 1. 获取逻辑层数据\n    UpdateLogicState();\n    \n    // 2. 速度平滑\n    speedVisual = Mathf.MoveTowards(speedVisual, speedLogic, accel * deltaTime);\n    \n    // 3. 计算纠偏方向\n    Vector3 correctionDir = (posLogic - posVisual).normalized;\n    \n    // 4. 合成移动方向\n    Vector3 dirMove = dirLogic * wLogicDirection + correctionDir * wCorrectionDirection;\n    if (dirMove.sqrMagnitude &lt; 0.0001f)\n        dirMove = dirLogic;\n    dirMove.Normalize();\n    dirVisual = dirMove;\n    \n    // 5. 表现层移动\n    posVisual += dirVisual * speedVisual * deltaTime;\n    \n    // 6. 轻微拉回\n    posVisual = Vector3.Lerp(posVisual, posLogic, posFixLerp * deltaTime);\n    \n    // 7. 应用到渲染\n    _ownerEntityView.SetWorldPosition(posVisual);\n}\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n## 注意事项\n\n1. **类型转换**: 确保 TrueSync 定点数正确转换为 Unity 浮点数\n2. **方向计算**: 需要处理静止状态（速度为0或位移极小）的情况\n3. **初始化**: 确保首次更新时方向计算不会出错\n4. **回滚兼容**: &#96;OnReset&#96; 需要正确重置所有新状态变量\n5. **参数调优**: 提供合理的默认参数值，但允许在 Inspector 中调整\n\n## 测试要点\n\n1. 正常移动时的平滑性\n2. 逻辑层方向突变时的表现层响应\n3. 表现层走偏后的自动纠偏\n4. 静止状态的处理\n5. 回滚时的状态重置\n6. RootMotion 模式不受影响",
  "name": "移动平滑方案集成",

---

我已经确认：视图组件是通过 `ViewArchetype`（按逻辑 `EArchetype` 映射）自动装配到 `EntityView` 的，所以我们新组件的接入点应当是**新增一个 ViewComponent 类**，并在对应的 `*ViewArchetype.cs` 里把它加入 `ViewComponents` 数组，同时把旧的 `TransViewComponent` 从这些原型映射里移除/不再装配，避免重复驱动。接下来我定位 `TransViewComponent` 目前是在哪些 ViewArchetype 里被装配的。

---

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Reviewing component interactions**

I see that the Projectile has the ProjectileViewComponent managing its visual position, while TransViewComponent is also involved in setting position, which could lead to duplication. It looks like ProjectileViewComponent’s OnUpdate function sets the position based on its visual sync, so if TransViewComponent runs afterward, it might override that. However, if the archetype's order is TransViewComponent before ProjectileViewComponent, that means the projectile component will still override the position later. I want to check how rotation is handled next.</details></think>

---

</details>
</tool-use>

---

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Checking component attachments**

I need to find out where ActionViewArchetype attaches AnimationViewComponent. It looks like BaseUnitViewArchetype includes ModelViewComponent, HUD, VFX, and TransViewComponent, but not AnimationViewComponent. So, I'm wondering if the Action archetype might add it? Hmm, it doesn't appear to be for base units. Maybe the ModelViewComponent includes an animator? I should check into ModelViewComponent quickly to clarify this!</details></think>

通过 &#96;ViewArchetype&#96; 自动创建/更新）。\n- &#96;TransViewComponent&#96; 当前被装配在：\n  - &#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Archetypes/Builtins/BaseUnitViewArchetype.cs&#96;\n  - &#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Archetypes/Builtins/ProjectileViewArchetype.cs&#96;\n\n## 实现方案\n\n### 1) 新增组件：&#96;SmoothMoveViewComponent&#96;（命名可按你偏好调整）\n**新增文件**：&#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Components/SmoothMoveViewComponent.cs&#96;\n\n#### 1.1 数据来源（按你选择的方式）\n- &#96;posLogic&#96;: 来自 &#96;OwnerEntity.GetComponent&lt;TransComponent&gt;().Position&#96;（TSVector→Vector3）\n- &#96;speedLogic&#96;: 优先来自 &#96;OwnerEntity.GetComponent&lt;MovementComponent&gt;().Speed&#96;（FP→float）；缺失则退化为 0\n- &#96;dirLogic&#96;: **由逻辑位置差分计算**：&#96;(posLogic - lastPosLogic).normalized&#96;\n  - 位移很小则复用上一帧 &#96;dirLogic&#96; 或用 &#96;TransComponent.Forward&#96; 兜底\n\n#### 1.2 组件内部状态（表现层）\n- &#96;posVisual&#96;：渲染位置\n- &#96;dirVisual&#96;：表现移动方向（合成后）\n- &#96;speedVisual&#96;：表现速度（MoveTowards 到 speedLogic）\n- &#96;lastPosLogicForDir&#96;：用于计算 &#96;dirLogic&#96;\n\n#### 1.3 核心更新（对应你给的算法）\n每帧（&#96;OnUpdate(deltaTime)&#96;）：\n1. 更新逻辑输入（posLogic/dirLogic/speedLogic）\n2. &#96;speedVisual = MoveTowards(speedVisual, speedLogic, accel * dt)&#96;\n3. &#96;correctionDir = (posLogic - posVisual).normalized&#96;\n4. &#96;dirMove = Normalize(dirLogic*wLogicDirection + correctionDir*wCorrectionDirection)&#96;\n5. &#96;posVisual += dirMove * speedVisual * dt&#96;\n6. &#96;posVisual = Lerp(posVisual, posLogic, posFixLerp * dt)&#96;\n7. &#96;OwnerEntityView.SetWorldPosition(posVisual)&#96;\n8. 旋转：继续从 &#96;TransComponent.Rotation&#96; 同步到 &#96;OwnerEntityView.SetWorldRotation(...)&#96;（保持现有“朝向由逻辑层权威”）\n\n#### 1.4 防穿帮护栏（建议内置，默认开启）\n- 增加 &#96;hardSnapDistance&#96;：当 &#96;|posLogic - posVisual|&#96; 超过阈值时，直接把 &#96;posVisual&#96; 设为 &#96;posLogic&#96;（避免极端情况下长时间追赶导致穿帮）。\n\n#### 1.5 OnReset 行为\n&#96;OnReset()&#96;：\n- 直接把 &#96;posVisual = posLogic&#96;、清空速度/方向的平滑状态，确保回滚/跳转后立刻对齐。\n\n#### 1.6 Projectile 的冲突规避（关键）\n&#96;ProjectileViewComponent&#96; 自己会在 &#96;OnUpdate&#96; 中设置位置/旋转（并且原本就排在 &#96;TransViewComponent&#96; 后面覆盖）。\n- 为避免多组件互相打架：&#96;SmoothMoveViewComponent&#96; 检测到 &#96;OwnerEntity&#96; 有 &#96;ProjectileComponent&#96; 时**直接 no-op**（或仅做最小旋转同步，按实际需要）。\n\n### 2) 原型装配替换（真正启用新组件）\n\n#### 2.1 BaseUnit\n**修改文件**：&#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Archetypes/Builtins/BaseUnitViewArchetype.cs&#96;\n- 把 &#96;typeof(TransViewComponent)&#96; 替换成 &#96;typeof(SmoothMoveViewComponent)&#96;\n\n#### 2.2 Projectile\n**修改文件**：&#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Archetypes/Builtins/ProjectileViewArchetype.cs&#96;\n- 同样替换 &#96;typeof(TransViewComponent)&#96; → &#96;typeof(SmoothMoveViewComponent)&#96;\n- 由于新组件会对 &#96;ProjectileComponent&#96; no-op，所以最终仍由 &#96;ProjectileViewComponent&#96; 驱动表现。\n\n## 编译/验证（执行阶段做）\n- 新增代码后：编译 &#96;AstrumProj/AstrumProj.sln&#96;\n- 若 Unity Console 仍报旧代码/未刷新：提醒你激活 Unity 并执行 &#96;Assets/Refresh&#96;\n\n## Todos\n- **add-new-viewcomponent**：新增 &#96;SmoothMoveViewComponent&#96; 并实现“方向合成 + 自主移动 + 纠偏 + Reset”。\n- **wire-baseunit**：更新 &#96;BaseUnitViewArchetype&#96; 替换掉 &#96;TransViewComponent&#96;。\n- **wire-projectile**：更新 &#96;ProjectileViewArchetype&#96; 替换掉 &#96;TransViewComponent&#96;，并在新组件内对 &#96;ProjectileComponent&#96; 做 no-op 防冲突。\n- **compile-sln**：编译 &#96;AstrumProj.sln&#96; 获取并修复编译错误。"

_**User**_

OnReset时不应该直接对齐位置

---

_**Agent (model default, mode Plan)**_

了解：`OnReset` 我们改成**不瞬移/不直接对齐到 `posLogic`**，而是“重置内部平滑状态 + 重新基准化方向计算”，让表现层继续从当前渲染位置出发，通过纠偏参数尽快回轨（必要时仍可由 `hardSnapDistance` 的极端保护触发）。我现在把计划里 `OnReset` 的行为描述改掉。

---

<tool-use data-tool-type="unknown" data-tool-name="create_plan">
<details>
<summary>Tool use: **create_plan**</summary>


Parameters:

```json
{
  "plan": "# 新增移动表现组件（替代 TransViewComponent）集成计划\n\n## 目标\n不改动现有 &#96;TransViewComponent&#96;，而是**新增一个新的移动表现 ViewComponent** 来实现你给的“逻辑即时、表现自主移动 + 纠偏”的方案，并在装配层把原型里原先的 &#96;TransViewComponent&#96; 替换掉，避免重复驱动。\n\n## 现状与接入点（已确认）\n- 视图组件不是 MonoBehaviour，而是 &#96;Astrum.View.Components.ViewComponent&#96;（由 &#96;EntityViewFactory&#96; 通过 &#96;ViewArchetype&#96; 自动创建/更新）。\n- &#96;TransViewComponent&#96; 当前被装配在：\n  - &#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Archetypes/Builtins/BaseUnitViewArchetype.cs&#96;\n  - &#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Archetypes/Builtins/ProjectileViewArchetype.cs&#96;\n\n## 实现方案\n\n### 1) 新增组件：&#96;PredictedMovementViewComponent&#96;（强调“移动预测/预测表现”含义）\n**新增文件**：&#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Components/SmoothMoveViewComponent.cs&#96;\n\n#### 1.1 数据来源（按你选择的方式）\n- &#96;posLogic&#96;: 来自 &#96;OwnerEntity.GetComponent&lt;TransComponent&gt;().Position&#96;（TSVector→Vector3）\n- &#96;speedLogic&#96;: 优先来自 &#96;OwnerEntity.GetComponent&lt;MovementComponent&gt;().Speed&#96;（FP→float）；缺失则退化为 0\n- &#96;dirLogic&#96;: **由逻辑位置差分计算**：&#96;(posLogic - lastPosLogic).normalized&#96;\n  - 位移很小则复用上一帧 &#96;dirLogic&#96; 或用 &#96;TransComponent.Forward&#96; 兜底\n\n#### 1.2 组件内部状态（表现层）\n- &#96;posVisual&#96;：渲染位置\n- &#96;dirVisual&#96;：表现移动方向（合成后）\n- &#96;speedVisual&#96;：表现速度（MoveTowards 到 speedLogic）\n- &#96;lastPosLogicForDir&#96;：用于计算 &#96;dirLogic&#96;\n\n#### 1.3 核心更新（对应你给的算法）\n每帧（&#96;OnUpdate(deltaTime)&#96;）：\n1. 更新逻辑输入（posLogic/dirLogic/speedLogic）\n2. &#96;speedVisual = MoveTowards(speedVisual, speedLogic, accel * dt)&#96;\n3. &#96;correctionDir = (posLogic - posVisual).normalized&#96;\n4. &#96;dirMove = Normalize(dirLogic*wLogicDirection + correctionDir*wCorrectionDirection)&#96;\n5. &#96;posVisual += dirMove * speedVisual * dt&#96;\n6. &#96;posVisual = Lerp(posVisual, posLogic, posFixLerp * dt)&#96;\n7. &#96;OwnerEntityView.SetWorldPosition(posVisual)&#96;\n8. 旋转：继续从 &#96;TransComponent.Rotation&#96; 同步到 &#96;OwnerEntityView.SetWorldRotation(...)&#96;（保持现有“朝向由逻辑层权威”）\n\n#### 1.4 防穿帮护栏（建议内置，默认开启）\n- 增加 &#96;hardSnapDistance&#96;：当 &#96;|posLogic - posVisual|&#96; 超过阈值时，直接把 &#96;posVisual&#96; 设为 &#96;posLogic&#96;（避免极端情况下长时间追赶导致穿帮）。\n\n#### 1.5 OnReset 行为\n&#96;OnReset()&#96;：\n- **不直接对齐/不瞬移到 &#96;posLogic&#96;**。\n- 将 &#96;posVisual&#96; 设为当前渲染位置（&#96;OwnerEntityView.GetWorldPosition()&#96;），并把 &#96;lastPosLogicForDir = posLogic&#96;、&#96;dirVisual/dirLogic&#96; 重新初始化为合理值（避免方向差分在 reset 帧产生异常尖峰）。\n- 清空速度平滑状态（例如 &#96;speedVisual = speedLogic&#96; 或置 0 后由 &#96;accel&#96; 拉起，二选一在实现时固定一种）。\n- 之后依靠 &#96;wCorrectionDirection&#96; + &#96;posFixLerp&#96; 让表现层回到逻辑轨道；仅在超过 &#96;hardSnapDistance&#96; 的极端情况下才触发硬保护对齐。\n\n#### 1.6 Projectile 的冲突规避（关键）\n&#96;ProjectileViewComponent&#96; 自己会在 &#96;OnUpdate&#96; 中设置位置/旋转（并且原本就排在 &#96;TransViewComponent&#96; 后面覆盖）。\n- 为避免多组件互相打架：&#96;SmoothMoveViewComponent&#96; 检测到 &#96;OwnerEntity&#96; 有 &#96;ProjectileComponent&#96; 时**直接 no-op**（或仅做最小旋转同步，按实际需要）。\n\n### 2) 原型装配替换（真正启用新组件）\n\n#### 2.1 BaseUnit\n**修改文件**：&#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Archetypes/Builtins/BaseUnitViewArchetype.cs&#96;\n- 把 &#96;typeof(TransViewComponent)&#96; 替换成 &#96;typeof(SmoothMoveViewComponent)&#96;\n\n#### 2.2 Projectile\n**修改文件**：&#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Archetypes/Builtins/ProjectileViewArchetype.cs&#96;\n- 同样替换 &#96;typeof(TransViewComponent)&#96; → &#96;typeof(SmoothMoveViewComponent)&#96;\n- 由于新组件会对 &#96;ProjectileComponent&#96; no-op，所以最终仍由 &#96;ProjectileViewComponent&#96; 驱动表现。\n\n## 编译/验证（执行阶段做）\n- 新增代码后：编译 &#96;AstrumProj/AstrumProj.sln&#96;\n- 若 Unity Console 仍报旧代码/未刷新：提醒你激活 Unity 并执行 &#96;Assets/Refresh&#96;\n\n## Todos\n- **add-new-viewcomponent**：新增 &#96;SmoothMoveViewComponent&#96; 并实现“方向合成 + 自主移动 + 纠偏 + Reset”。\n- **wire-baseunit**：更新 &#96;BaseUnitViewArchetype&#96; 替换掉 &#96;TransViewComponent&#96;。\n- **wire-projectile**：更新 &#96;ProjectileViewArchetype&#96; 替换掉 &#96;TransViewComponent&#96;，并在新组件内对 &#96;ProjectileComponent&#96; 做 no-op 防冲突。\n- **compile-sln**：编译 &#96;AstrumProj.sln&#96; 获取并修复编译错误。"
}

---

_**User**_

确认一下当前的逻辑层有没有角色移动状态的定义，也就是静止和移动的区分。表现层应该要基于这个进行移动表现的处理

---

_**Agent (model default, mode Plan)**_

我先在逻辑层代码里确认是否存在“静止/移动”的显式状态定义（例如 `IsMoving/MoveState`），以及目前移动是如何被判定的（输入阈值、速度、Action等），再给出表现层应当依赖的权威信号。

我已经搜到一个明确的“移动状态”能力：`MoveStateCapability`，以及输入层也有“是否静止”的判定（`LSInput.IsIdle()`）。我把这些文件读出来，确认它们如何定义“静止/移动”，然后给出表现层应该依赖的权威信号优先级（状态机 vs 输入 vs 速度/位移）。

---

### 结论：逻辑层“静止/移动”目前有两种层级

#### 1) **AI 有显式“Idle/Move”状态机**
`MoveStateCapability`/`IdleStateCapability` 会基于 `AIStateMachineComponent.CurrentState` 在 `"Idle"` 与 `"Move"` 间切换（这套是 **AI 标签**的能力，不是所有角色通用的“是否在移动”布尔量）。

```49:87:d:\Develop\Projects\Astrum\AstrumProj\Assets\Script\AstrumLogic\Capabilities\MoveStateCapability.cs
public override void Tick(Entity entity)
{
    var fsm = GetComponent<AIStateMachineComponent>(entity);
    if (fsm == null) return;
    if (!string.Equals(fsm.CurrentState, "Move", StringComparison.Ordinal)) return;

    // ...
    var delta = fsm.WanderTarget - pos;
    var d = delta.magnitude;
    if ((float)d <= ArriveThreshold)
    {
        fsm.NextState = "Idle";
        return;
    }
    var norm = Normalize2D(delta);
    PushMoveInput(entity, norm.x, norm.z);
}
```

#### 2) **通用移动（含玩家）没有“IsMoving”字段，移动由输入与阈值/可移动性判定**
`MovementCapability` 的移动触发条件本质是：`inputMagnitude > threshold && movementComponent.CanMove`，并直接更新 `TransComponent.Position`。

```96:193:d:\Develop\Projects\Astrum\AstrumProj\Assets\Script\AstrumLogic\Capabilities\MovementCapability.cs
// 获取移动阈值
FP threshold = DEFAULT_MOVEMENT_THRESHOLD;

// 输入转 FP，并算强度
FP moveX = (FP)(input.MoveX / (double)(1L << 32));
FP moveY = (FP)(input.MoveY / (double)(1L << 32));
FP inputMagnitude = FP.Sqrt(moveX * moveX + moveY * moveY);

// 更新朝向
if (inputMagnitude > threshold)
{
    TSVector inputDirection = new TSVector(moveX, FP.Zero, moveY);
    if (inputDirection.sqrMagnitude > FP.EN4)
    {
        transComponent.Rotation = TSQuaternion.LookRotation(inputDirection, TSVector.up);
    }
}

// 处理移动（如果用户输入位移未被禁用）
if (inputMagnitude > threshold && movementComponent.CanMove)
{
    FP speed = movementComponent.Speed;
    // ... 更新 transComponent.Position ...
}
```

另外，“能不能移动”还有一层更通用的状态约束在 `StateComponent.CanMove()`（眩晕/冻结/击退/死亡等）。

```61:68:d:\Develop\Projects\Astrum\AstrumProj\Assets\Script\AstrumLogic\Components\StateComponent.cs
public bool CanMove()
{
    return !Get(StateType.STUNNED) 
        && !Get(StateType.FROZEN) 
        && !Get(StateType.KNOCKED_BACK) 
        && !Get(StateType.DEAD);
}
```

### 输入对象与“是否移动”的判定现状
逻辑侧实际使用的是生成的 `Astrum.Generated.LSInput`（MoveX/MoveY 是 Q31.32 的 `long`），不是 `AstrumLogic/FrameSync/LSInput.cs` 里那份（那份目前是整段注释掉的）。

```167:200:d:\Develop\Projects\Astrum\AstrumProj\Assets\Script\Generated\Message\gamemessages_C_2000.cs
// 帧同步输入数据
[MemoryPackable]
[MessageAttribute(2004)]
public partial class LSInput : MessageObject
{
    /// X轴移动输入（Q31.32 定点数）
    public long MoveX { get; set; }

    /// Y轴移动输入（Q31.32 定点数）
    public long MoveY { get; set; }

    public bool Attack { get; set; }
    public bool Skill1 { get; set; }
    public bool Skill2 { get; set; }
    // ...
}
```

同时在 `ActionCapability` 里也会把“move”当作一个命令：`(MoveX!=0 || MoveY!=0)`。

```714:722:d:\Develop\Projects\Astrum\AstrumProj\Assets\Script\AstrumLogic\Capabilities\ActionCapability.cs
else
{
    // 配置表未加载，使用硬编码作为后备
    ASLogger.Instance.Warning("ActionCapability: ActionCommandMappingTable未加载，使用硬编码后备", "Action.Capability");
    AddOrRefreshCommand(commands, "move", (currentInput.MoveX != 0 || currentInput.MoveY != 0) ? 1 : 0, 0, 0);
    AddOrRefreshCommand(commands, "attack", currentInput.Attack ? 3 : 0, currentInput.MouseWorldX, currentInput.MouseWorldZ);
    AddOrRefreshCommand(commands, "skill1", currentInput.Skill1 ? 3 : 0, currentInput.MouseWorldX, currentInput.MouseWorldZ);
    AddOrRefreshCommand(commands, "skill2", currentInput.Skill2 ? 3 : 0, currentInput.MouseWorldX, currentInput.MouseWorldZ);
}
```

### 对我们新 `PredictedMovementViewComponent` 的落地建议（基于现状）
- **不要指望逻辑层已有统一 `IsMoving` 字段**；目前更可靠的是组合信号：
  - **主判定（玩家/常规移动）**：`LSInputComponent.CurrentInput.MoveX/MoveY` 的非零 +（可选）`MovementComponent.CanMove` / `StateComponent.CanMove()`。
  - **兜底判定（无输入但在动）**：用 `TransComponent.Position` 的差分（比如击退、外力位移）。
- 这样表现层在“静止/移动”切换时才决定是否让 `speedLogic`/`dirLogic` 进入你的“自主移动+纠偏”流程（静止时可以让 `speedLogic=0`，但继续允许 `posFixLerp` 做小幅回轨）。

---

_**User**_

还是不要表现层自己判输入，需要修改逻辑层，使 MoveComponent 有明确的 IsMoving 字段来标识当前是否在移动。注意使用组件置脏的方式来做通知

---

_**Agent (model default, mode Plan)**_

收到：我们把“是否在移动”的权威判定上移到逻辑层，在 `MovementComponent` 增加 `IsMoving`（并且只在状态变化时置脏），表现层组件只读这个字段来决定是否执行预测移动/回轨逻辑。接下来我先把项目里“组件置脏/同步到视图”的机制定位清楚（Entity/World/Stage 哪个负责），再把计划改成包含逻辑层改动与视图监听。

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Refining movement logic**

I'm considering whether to use `public bool IsMoving { get; private set; }` with a backing field or simply `public bool IsMoving { get; set; }`. The goal is to ensure we can only set it through a method, specifically `SetIsMoving(Entity entity, bool value)` on MovementComponent, which will handle marking the component as dirty. This involves encapsulating the logic in the capability while making sure I address the user's request about marking components dirty when `IsMoving` changes. I’ll also ensure to update the necessary components and views accordingly.</details></think>

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Evaluating movement states**

I'm working on SkillDisplacement and Knockback moves, thinking about how to set the IsMoving state. If any movement system is active, IsMoving should be true. Each system needs to set IsMoving correctly. I wonder if conflicts will arise, particularly with MovementCapability potentially setting it to false during knockback. During SkillDisplacement, user input movement is disabled, so I need to ensure IsMoving is set accurately for both situations. I also need to check how capability disable works for a thorough update.
**Planning movement updates**

I need to implement a dirty set for movement capabilities, where I call entity.MarkComponentDirty(MovementComponent.ComponentTypeId) after changing IsMoving, but only if the MovementComponent exists and the value has changed. There’s a potential complication with MemoryPackable related to adding fields. It’s likely that adding a property is acceptable, but I need to confirm if a partial class is required. I should check in with the user about whether IsMoving should represent any displacement this logic frame or current intent to move. I suspect they want a static state for animations.
**Clarifying movement logic**

If there's input but the movement is blocked, IsMoving should be false. Similarly, if the input is present but speed is zero, I need to consider whether to keep IsMoving false or adjust it based on whether actual movement occurs. I’ll set IsMoving to true only if the resulting delta position exceeds a certain threshold. During the MovementCapability tick, I'll compute the necessary values and update IsMoving accordingly. I should also consider resetting IsMoving in the OnDeactivate methods of Knockback and SkillDisplacement while noting potential challenges if the entity gets destroyed. Time to modify the plan to include all these tasks!</details></think>

```json
{
  "plan": "# 新增移动表现组件（替代 TransViewComponent）集成计划\n\n## 目标\n不改动现有 &#96;TransViewComponent&#96;，而是**新增一个新的移动表现 ViewComponent** 来实现你给的“逻辑即时、表现自主移动 + 纠偏”的方案，并在装配层把原型里原先的 &#96;TransViewComponent&#96; 替换掉，避免重复驱动。\n\n## 现状与接入点（已确认）\n- 视图组件不是 MonoBehaviour，而是 &#96;Astrum.View.Components.ViewComponent&#96;（由 &#96;EntityViewFactory&#96; 通过 &#96;ViewArchetype&#96; 自动创建/更新）。\n- &#96;TransViewComponent&#96; 当前被装配在：\n  - &#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Archetypes/Builtins/BaseUnitViewArchetype.cs&#96;\n  - &#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Archetypes/Builtins/ProjectileViewArchetype.cs&#96;\n\n## 实现方案\n\n### 0) 逻辑层新增权威移动状态（IsMoving）+ 组件置脏通知\n\n#### 0.1 在 MovementComponent 增加 IsMoving 字段\n**修改文件**：&#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumLogic/Components/MovementComponent.cs&#96;\n- 新增 &#96;public bool IsMoving { get; set; }&#96;（参与序列化/回滚），作为“逻辑层权威：当前是否在移动”的标记。\n\n#### 0.2 在产生位移的 Capability 中维护 IsMoving，并在变化时置脏\n**修改文件（至少）**：\n- &#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumLogic/Capabilities/MovementCapability.cs&#96;\n- &#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumLogic/Capabilities/KnockbackCapability.cs&#96;\n- &#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumLogic/Capabilities/SkillDisplacementCapability.cs&#96;\n\n**规则**：\n- 以“本逻辑帧实际应用了位移”为准设置 &#96;IsMoving=true&#96;；否则（该能力停用/未产生位移）设置为 &#96;false&#96;。\n- 仅当 &#96;IsMoving&#96; 值发生变化时，调用 &#96;entity.MarkComponentDirty(MovementComponent.ComponentTypeId)&#96;，让 &#96;Stage.SyncDirtyComponents()&#96; 通知到视图层。\n\n&gt; 说明：项目当前的脏组件链路是 &#96;Entity.MarkComponentDirty&#96; → &#96;Stage.SyncDirtyComponents&#96; → &#96;EntityView.SyncDirtyComponents&#96; → &#96;ViewComponent.SyncDataFromComponent&#96;。\n\n### 1) 新增组件：&#96;PredictedMovementViewComponent&#96;（强调“移动预测/预测表现”含义）\n**新增文件**：&#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Components/SmoothMoveViewComponent.cs&#96;\n\n#### 1.1 数据来源（按你选择的方式）\n- &#96;posLogic&#96;: 来自 &#96;OwnerEntity.GetComponent&lt;TransComponent&gt;().Position&#96;（TSVector→Vector3）\n- &#96;speedLogic&#96;: 优先来自 &#96;OwnerEntity.GetComponent&lt;MovementComponent&gt;().Speed&#96;（FP→float）；缺失则退化为 0\n- &#96;dirLogic&#96;: **由逻辑位置差分计算**：&#96;(posLogic - lastPosLogic).normalized&#96;\n  - 位移很小则复用上一帧 &#96;dirLogic&#96; 或用 &#96;TransComponent.Forward&#96; 兜底\n\n#### 1.2 组件内部状态（表现层）\n- &#96;posVisual&#96;：渲染位置\n- &#96;dirVisual&#96;：表现移动方向（合成后）\n- &#96;speedVisual&#96;：表现速度（MoveTowards 到 speedLogic）\n- &#96;lastPosLogicForDir&#96;：用于计算 &#96;dirLogic&#96;\n\n#### 1.3 核心更新（对应你给的算法）\n每帧（&#96;OnUpdate(deltaTime)&#96;）：\n1. 更新逻辑输入（posLogic/dirLogic/speedLogic）\n2. &#96;speedVisual = MoveTowards(speedVisual, speedLogic, accel * dt)&#96;\n3. &#96;correctionDir = (posLogic - posVisual).normalized&#96;\n4. &#96;dirMove = Normalize(dirLogic*wLogicDirection + correctionDir*wCorrectionDirection)&#96;\n5. &#96;posVisual += dirMove * speedVisual * dt&#96;\n6. &#96;posVisual = Lerp(posVisual, posLogic, posFixLerp * dt)&#96;\n7. &#96;OwnerEntityView.SetWorldPosition(posVisual)&#96;\n8. 旋转：继续从 &#96;TransComponent.Rotation&#96; 同步到 &#96;OwnerEntityView.SetWorldRotation(...)&#96;（保持现有“朝向由逻辑层权威”）\n\n#### 1.4 防穿帮护栏（建议内置，默认开启）\n- 增加 &#96;hardSnapDistance&#96;：当 &#96;|posLogic - posVisual|&#96; 超过阈值时，直接把 &#96;posVisual&#96; 设为 &#96;posLogic&#96;（避免极端情况下长时间追赶导致穿帮）。\n\n#### 1.5 OnReset 行为\n&#96;OnReset()&#96;：\n- **不直接对齐/不瞬移到 &#96;posLogic&#96;**。\n- 将 &#96;posVisual&#96; 设为当前渲染位置（&#96;OwnerEntityView.GetWorldPosition()&#96;），并把 &#96;lastPosLogicForDir = posLogic&#96;、&#96;dirVisual/dirLogic&#96; 重新初始化为合理值（避免方向差分在 reset 帧产生异常尖峰）。\n- 清空速度平滑状态（例如 &#96;speedVisual = speedLogic&#96; 或置 0 后由 &#96;accel&#96; 拉起，二选一在实现时固定一种）。\n- 之后依靠 &#96;wCorrectionDirection&#96; + &#96;posFixLerp&#96; 让表现层回到逻辑轨道；仅在超过 &#96;hardSnapDistance&#96; 的极端情况下才触发硬保护对齐。\n\n#### 1.6 Projectile 的冲突规避（关键）\n&#96;ProjectileViewComponent&#96; 自己会在 &#96;OnUpdate&#96; 中设置位置/旋转（并且原本就排在 &#96;TransViewComponent&#96; 后面覆盖）。\n- 为避免多组件互相打架：&#96;SmoothMoveViewComponent&#96; 检测到 &#96;OwnerEntity&#96; 有 &#96;ProjectileComponent&#96; 时**直接 no-op**（或仅做最小旋转同步，按实际需要）。\n\n### 2) 原型装配替换（真正启用新组件）\n\n#### 2.1 BaseUnit\n**修改文件**：&#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Archetypes/Builtins/BaseUnitViewArchetype.cs&#96;\n- 把 &#96;typeof(TransViewComponent)&#96; 替换成 &#96;typeof(SmoothMoveViewComponent)&#96;\n\n#### 2.2 Projectile\n**修改文件**：&#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Archetypes/Builtins/ProjectileViewArchetype.cs&#96;\n- 同样替换 &#96;typeof(TransViewComponent)&#96; → &#96;typeof(SmoothMoveViewComponent)&#96;\n- 由于新组件会对 &#96;ProjectileComponent&#96; no-op，所以最终仍由 &#96;ProjectileViewComponent&#96; 驱动表现。\n\n## 编译/验证（执行阶段做）\n- 新增代码后：编译 &#96;AstrumProj/AstrumProj.sln&#96;\n- 若 Unity Console 仍报旧代码/未刷新：提醒你激活 Unity 并执行 &#96;Assets/Refresh&#96;\n\n## Todos\n- **add-new-viewcomponent**：新增 &#96;SmoothMoveViewComponent&#96; 并实现“方向合成 + 自主移动 + 纠偏 + Reset”。\n- **wire-baseunit**：更新 &#96;BaseUnitViewArchetype&#96; 替换掉 &#96;TransViewComponent&#96;。\n- **wire-projectile**：更新 &#96;ProjectileViewArchetype&#96; 替换掉 &#96;TransViewComponent&#96;，并在新组件内对 &#96;ProjectileComponent&#96; 做 no-op 防冲突。\n- **compile-sln**：编译 &#96;AstrumProj.sln&#96; 获取并修复编译错误。"
}

拉回），避免静止时被拉回。\n   - **仅当 &#96;|posLogic - posVisual| &gt; hardSnapDistance&#96;** 才瞬移对齐（你确认允许的例外）。\n3. **若 &#96;isMovingLogic == true&#96;**：\n   - &#96;speedVisual = MoveTowards(speedVisual, speedLogic, accel * dt)&#96;\n   - &#96;correctionDir = (posLogic - posVisual).normalized&#96;\n   - &#96;dirMove = Normalize(dirLogic*wLogicDirection + correctionDir*wCorrectionDirection)&#96;\n   - &#96;posVisual += dirMove * speedVisual * dt&#96;\n   - &#96;posVisual = Lerp(posVisual, posLogic, posFixLerp * dt)&#96;\n   - &#96;OwnerEntityView.SetWorldPosition(posVisual)&#96;\n4. 旋转：继续从 &#96;TransComponent.Rotation&#96; _**User**_

要注意，当逻辑帧不往前更新的时候，如果保持着移动状态，表现层需要根据原有速度和朝向继续向前移动，此时不能单纯按照 posLogic 的方向进行纠偏

_**Agent (model default, mode Plan)**_

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Updating the plan**

I realize that logic won't change, so IsMoving remains true. I need to focus on using CreatePlan for updating old_str/new_str values. I might consider whether to ask a question, but maybe it’s not necessary; I can just propose the algorithm instead. It seems like I can manage this without needing a specific tool and will make sure to update the plan accordingly. This feels like a good direction!</details></think>

---

明白：要把“**逻辑帧停更**”当成一种运行态来处理。实现上我们在 `PredictedMovementViewComponent` 里检测 `OwnerEntity.World.CurFrame` 是否前进；若没前进但 `IsMoving=true`，表现层继续按**上一次缓存的速度+朝向做惯性前进**，且纠偏只能做“横向回轨”，不能把角色往后拉回到旧 `posLogic`。我现在把这段行为写进计划。

  "plan": "# 新增移动表现组件（替代 TransViewComponent）集成计划\n\n## 目标\n不改动现有 &#96;TransViewComponent&#96;，而是**新增一个新的移动表现 ViewComponent** 来实现你给的“逻辑即时、表现自主移动 + 纠偏”的方案，并在装配层把原型里原先的 &#96;TransViewComponent&#96; 替换掉，避免重复驱动。\n\n## 现状与接入点（已确认）\n- 视图组件不是 MonoBehaviour，而是 &#96;Astrum.View.Components.ViewComponent&#96;（由 &#96;EntityViewFactory&#96; 通过 &#96;ViewArchetype&#96; 自动创建/更新）。\n- &#96;TransViewComponent&#96; 当前被装配在：\n  - &#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Archetypes/Builtins/BaseUnitViewArchetype.cs&#96;\n  - &#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Archetypes/Builtins/ProjectileViewArchetype.cs&#96;\n\n## 实现方案\n\n### 0) 逻辑层新增权威移动状态（IsMoving）+ 组件置脏通知\n\n#### 0.1 在 MovementComponent 增加 IsMoving 字段\n**修改文件**：&#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumLogic/Components/MovementComponent.cs&#96;\n- 新增 &#96;public bool IsMoving { get; set; }&#96;（参与序列化/回滚），作为“逻辑层权威：当前是否在移动”的标记。\n\n#### 0.2 在产生位移的 Capability 中维护 IsMoving，并在变化时置脏\n**修改文件（至少）**：\n- &#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumLogic/Capabilities/MovementCapability.cs&#96;\n- &#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumLogic/Capabilities/KnockbackCapability.cs&#96;\n- &#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumLogic/Capabilities/SkillDisplacementCapability.cs&#96;\n\n**规则**：\n- 以“本逻辑帧实际应用了位移”为准设置 &#96;IsMoving=true&#96;；否则（该能力停用/未产生位移）设置为 &#96;false&#96;。\n- 仅当 &#96;IsMoving&#96; 值发生变化时，调用 &#96;entity.MarkComponentDirty(MovementComponent.ComponentTypeId)&#96;，让 &#96;Stage.SyncDirtyComponents()&#96; 通知到视图层。\n\n&gt; 说明：项目当前的脏组件链路是 &#96;Entity.MarkComponentDirty&#96; → &#96;Stage.SyncDirtyComponents&#96; → &#96;EntityView.SyncDirtyComponents&#96; → &#96;ViewComponent.SyncDataFromComponent&#96;。\n\n### 1) 新增组件：&#96;PredictedMovementViewComponent&#96;（强调“移动预测/预测表现”含义）\n**新增文件**：&#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Components/SmoothMoveViewComponent.cs&#96;\n\n#### 1.1 数据来源（按你选择的方式）\n- &#96;posLogic&#96;: 来自 &#96;OwnerEntity.GetComponent&lt;TransComponent&gt;().Position&#96;（TSVector→Vector3）\n- &#96;speedLogic&#96;: 优先来自 &#96;OwnerEntity.GetComponent&lt;MovementComponent&gt;().Speed&#96;（FP→float）；缺失则退化为 0\n- &#96;dirLogic&#96;: **由逻辑位置差分计算**：&#96;(posLogic - lastPosLogic).normalized&#96;\n  - 位移很小则复用上一帧 &#96;dirLogic&#96; 或用 &#96;TransComponent.Forward&#96; 兜底\n\n#### 1.2 组件内部状态（表现层）\n- &#96;posVisual&#96;：渲染位置\n- &#96;dirVisual&#96;：表现移动方向（合成后）\n- &#96;speedVisual&#96;：表现速度（MoveTowards 到 speedLogic）\n- &#96;lastPosLogicForDir&#96;：用于计算 &#96;dirLogic&#96;\n\n#### 1.3 核心更新（对应你给的算法，且处理“逻辑帧停更”+“静止不拉回”规则）\n每帧（&#96;OnUpdate(deltaTime)&#96;）：\n1. 从逻辑层读取：\n   - &#96;posLogic&#96;（&#96;TransComponent.Position&#96;）\n   - &#96;isMovingLogic&#96;（&#96;MovementComponent.IsMoving&#96;）\n   - &#96;logicFrame&#96;（&#96;OwnerEntity.World.CurFrame&#96;，用于判断逻辑帧是否前进）\n2. 维护缓存：&#96;lastLogicFrameSeen&#96;、&#96;lastPosLogicSeen&#96;、&#96;cachedSpeedLogic&#96;、&#96;cachedDirLogic&#96;。\n\n3. **若 &#96;isMovingLogic == false&#96;**：\n   - **不进行任何位置更新**（不执行预测移动、不执行 &#96;posFixLerp&#96; 拉回），避免静止时被拉回。\n   - **仅当 &#96;|posLogic - posVisual| &gt; hardSnapDistance&#96;** 才瞬移对齐（允许的例外）。\n\n4. **若 &#96;isMovingLogic == true&#96; 且逻辑帧有前进（&#96;logicFrame != lastLogicFrameSeen&#96; 或 &#96;posLogic&#96; 明显变化）**：\n   - 更新 &#96;cachedSpeedLogic&#96;（来自 &#96;MovementComponent.Speed&#96;）与 &#96;cachedDirLogic&#96;（由 &#96;posLogic-lastPosLogicSeen&#96; 差分得到，必要时用 &#96;TransComponent.Forward&#96; 兜底）。\n   - 进行正常“方向合成 + 纠偏 + posFixLerp”的更新：\n     - &#96;speedVisual = MoveTowards(speedVisual, cachedSpeedLogic, accel * dt)&#96;\n     - &#96;correctionDir = (posLogic - posVisual).normalized&#96;\n     - &#96;dirMove = Normalize(cachedDirLogic*wLogicDirection + correctionDir*wCorrectionDirection)&#96;\n     - &#96;posVisual += dirMove * speedVisual * dt&#96;\n     - &#96;posVisual = Lerp(posVisual, posLogic, posFixLerp * dt)&#96;\n     - &#96;OwnerEntityView.SetWorldPosition(posVisual)&#96;\n\n5. **若 &#96;isMovingLogic == true&#96; 但逻辑帧未前进（停更/卡帧）**：\n   - 表现层必须继续使用**上一次的 &#96;dirVisual&#96; + &#96;speedVisual&#96;** 做惯性前进：\n     - &#96;posVisual += dirVisual * speedVisual * dt&#96;\n   - **不能用 &#96;posLogic&#96; 的方向做全量纠偏**（会被拉回到旧逻辑点）。此时纠偏仅允许“横向回轨”，避免后拉：\n     - 令 &#96;error = posLogic - posVisual&#96;\n     - 令 &#96;errorPerp = error - dirVisual * Dot(error, dirVisual)&#96;（沿运动方向的误差分量剔除）\n     - 使用 &#96;errorPerp.normalized * wCorrectionDirection&#96; 参与转向/或用 &#96;posFixLerp&#96; 仅对 &#96;errorPerp&#96; 分量做回收（实现时二选一，默认只做转向更安全）。\n   - 若 &#96;|posLogic - posVisual| &gt; hardSnapDistance&#96; 仍触发硬对齐（防极端穿帮）。\n\n6. 旋转：继续从 &#96;TransComponent.Rotation&#96; 同步到 &#96;OwnerEntityView.SetWorldRotation(...)&#96;（保持现有“朝向由逻辑层权威”）\n\n#### 1.4 防穿帮护栏（建议内置，默认开启）\n- 增加 &#96;hardSnapDistance&#96;：当 &#96;|posLogic - posVisual|&#96; 超过阈值时，直接把 &#96;posVisual&#96; 设为 &#96;posLogic&#96;（避免极端情况下长时间追赶导致穿帮）。\n\n#### 1.5 OnReset 行为\n&#96;OnReset()&#96;：\n- **不直接对齐/不瞬移到 &#96;posLogic&#96;**。\n- 将 &#96;posVisual&#96; 设为当前渲染位置（&#96;OwnerEntityView.GetWorldPosition()&#96;），并把 &#96;lastPosLogicForDir = posLogic&#96;、&#96;dirVisual/dirLogic&#96; 重新初始化为合理值（避免方向差分在 reset 帧产生异常尖峰）。\n- 清空速度平滑状态（例如 &#96;speedVisual = speedLogic&#96; 或置 0 后由 &#96;accel&#96; 拉起，二选一在实现时固定一种）。\n- 之后依靠 &#96;wCorrectionDirection&#96; + &#96;posFixLerp&#96; 让表现层回到逻辑轨道；仅在超过 &#96;hardSnapDistance&#96; 的极端情况下才触发硬保护对齐。\n\n#### 1.6 Projectile 的冲突规避（关键）\n&#96;ProjectileViewComponent&#96; 自己会在 &#96;OnUpdate&#96; 中设置位置/旋转（并且原本就排在 &#96;TransViewComponent&#96; 后面覆盖）。\n- 为避免多组件互相打架：&#96;SmoothMoveViewComponent&#96; 检测到 &#96;OwnerEntity&#96; 有 &#96;ProjectileComponent&#96; 时**直接 no-op**（或仅做最小旋转同步，按实际需要）。\n\n### 2) 原型装配替换（真正启用新组件）\n\n#### 2.1 BaseUnit\n**修改文件**：&#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Archetypes/Builtins/BaseUnitViewArchetype.cs&#96;\n- 把 &#96;typeof(TransViewComponent)&#96; 替换成 &#96;typeof(SmoothMoveViewComponent)&#96;\n\n#### 2.2 Projectile\n**修改文件**：&#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Archetypes/Builtins/ProjectileViewArchetype.cs&#96;\n- 同样替换 &#96;typeof(TransViewComponent)&#96; → &#96;typeof(SmoothMoveViewComponent)&#96;\n- 由于新组件会对 &#96;ProjectileComponent&#96; no-op，所以最终仍由 &#96;ProjectileViewComponent&#96; 驱动表现。\n\n## 编译/验证（执行阶段做）\n- 新增代码后：编译 &#96;AstrumProj/AstrumProj.sln&#96;\n- 若 Unity Console 仍报旧代码/未刷新：提醒你激活 Unity 并执行 &#96;Assets/Refresh&#96;\n\n## Todos\n- **add-new-viewcomponent**：新增 &#96;SmoothMoveViewComponent&#96; 并实现“方向合成 + 自主移动 + 纠偏 + Reset”。\n- **wire-baseunit**：更新 &#96;BaseUnitViewArchetype&#96; 替换掉 &#96;TransViewComponent&#96;。\n- **wire-projectile**：更新 &#96;ProjectileViewArchetype&#96; 替换掉 &#96;TransViewComponent&#96;，并在新组件内对 &#96;ProjectileComponent&#96; 做 no-op 防冲突。\n- **compile-sln**：编译 &#96;AstrumProj.sln&#96; 获取并修复编译错误。"
}

_**Agent (model default, mode Agent)**_

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**EvaluatingMovement Logic**

I'm considering whether a per-frame aggregator in MovementComponent could help. Each capability that applies displacement reports movement at the end of the frame. But the plan suggests we maintain IsMoving unless inaction occurs. The user mentions issues with view updates and frame stalling, which complicate things. If we set IsMoving to false too quickly, higher-priority capabilities like Knockback could create inconsistencies. We need a central logic to ensure IsMoving is only set to false when there’s no movement from any source during the frame.
**Exploring Movement Logic**

I'm considering a couple of options for the MovementComponent. One idea is to add a "movingFrame" integer and a "movedThisFrame" boolean. Each movement source would update `LastMovedFrame` and set IsMoving to true when movement occurs. After all capabilities run, I could check if `LastMovedFrame` equals the current frame to set IsMoving. However, since there's no post-update hook, I think it’s better to finalize IsMoving at the beginning of each tick in MovementCapability. This way, we'll ensure that higher-priority movements get reflected correctly.
**Refining Movement Component Logic**

I’m considering how the MovementComponent should handle its LastMovedFrame. If Movement doesn’t move, it shouldn’t clear LastMovedFrame, but should only do that at the beginning of each frame. We could set IsMoving based on whether LastMovedFrame equals the current frame at the end of processing.

For the MovementComponent, having an authoritative IsMoving property is essential. I think LastMovedFrame might not need to be serialized since it’s for runtime evaluation, but it needs to work correctly even after rollbacks. So my best option is to keep IsMoving as the main derived value.
**Exploring Alternative Movement Logic**

I’m thinking about an alternative approach to manage IsMoving by tracking whether there was movement in this logic tick. It’s important to avoid overriding; perhaps only the lowest priority movement updater should set IsMoving to false after all sources have acted. Since MovementCapability has a priority of 100, while SkillDisplacement and Knockback have 150, they should run first.

I can implement a `MovedThisFrame` flag in MovementComponent, making it MemoryPackIgnored. Each movement source would set this flag whenever movement occurs. This should help keep everything in sync!
**Refining Movement Reset Logic**

At the beginning of each frame, I think we need to reset IsMoving to false. MovementCapability runs every frame for entities with MovementComponent, making it an ideal candidate to handle this reset at the start of its Tick. However, I worry that if Knockback runs first, it might set the moved flag incorrectly.

One potential solution is to introduce a new capability with the highest priority to manage the reset or have it happen at the beginning of the world tick per entity. Alternatively, I could use a LastMoveFrame integer to track movement, updating it whenever displacement occurs. After running all capabilities, I can check if IsMoving needs updating based on LastMoveFrame. I should investigate if there's a late capability or system that can help with this!</details></think>

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Evaluating movement capabilities**

I'm considering how the CapabilitySystem runs in order of priority, with higher priorities like skill displacement and knockback taking precedence over movement. I think we need to ensure that the MovementCapability doesn’t set IsMoving to false if a knockback occurs first. 

Maybe I can implement a new capability, `MovementStateFinalizeCapability`, with a very low priority. It would handle the IsMoving status and only set it to false if no movement occurred during the current frame. This could streamline the process effectively.
**Refining movement logic**

I see that implementing a flag, `LastMovedFrame`, is crucial. This flag can be updated by various displacement sources, which would help ensure accuracy after everything runs. It avoids the hassle of multiple capabilities needing to set IsMoving to false. 

The user mentioned modifying the logic so the MoveComponent has IsMoving and utilizes dirty notifications, which seems compatible with adding a finalizing capability. Although I need to tread carefully not to change the plan file, adding a small finalizer aligns with the overall intent of the plan while improving correctness.
**Ensuring movement capability functions**

I’m realizing that the MovementCapability might not activate if user input for movement is disabled, especially if the entity lacks an LSInput. The ShouldActivate function requires several components, and even though entities typically have them, they may still run into issues during knockback where user input is disabled. 

I'll need to ensure that the MovementCapability isn't deactivated by the UserInputMovement tag during this time. I'll consider creating a new capability with low priority that has Movement tags but excludes UserInputMovement, ensuring it remains functional.
**Implementing movement state capability**

I’m figuring out that even if a tag is disabled, using empty tags might bypass the disable check. To make this work, I think I’ll set the tags to empty so that the capability isn’t disabled. However, we still need to register it correctly. 

I’ll implement `MovementMotionStateCapability` with a very low priority. It will activate if the entity has both MovementComponent and TransComponent. This capability will compare `LastMovedFrame` to the current world frame to determine movement status. For newly created entities, I should set `LastMovedFrame` to -1 by default to avoid confusion. Adding an internal field could also help with the logic.
**Finalizing movement logic**

I’m considering how IsMoving should be updated without needing to modify each capability. If each capability only sets LastMovedFrame while moving, then a finalizer can manage IsMoving each frame. This ensures it updates correctly even during knockbacks. 

But if logic frames stall, that could be tricky since the capability system wouldn’t tick. The plan is to include LastMovedFrame in the MovementComponent for accurate calculations while being careful not to disrupt serialization. It seems like keeping track of when displacement occurs and correctly resetting IsMoving will simplify this whole process!
**Addressing component updates**

It looks like I've found a mismatch in the plan regarding the SmoothMoveViewComponent, which should actually be called PredictedMovementViewComponent. I’ll correctly implement this component without editing the plan file. 

For implementing the PredictedMovementViewComponent, since it's a ViewComponent and not a MonoBehaviour, I’ll keep public fields for debugging. I need to calculate direction and speed for movement without user input, ensuring the view continues moving during logic frame stalls. 

The strategy involves maintaining cached values for speed and direction, ensuring consistency in updates even when frame stalls occur. I'll also make sure to implement updating mechanisms based on movement component changes while maintaining alignment with the plan's requirements!
**Implementing movement state updates**

I’m focusing on caching `logicMoveSpeedCached` from the MovementComponent's Speed. If the speed changes, it may not trigger synchronization, so I need to decide whether to poll this value each frame. I prefer polling since it’s efficient. 

Next up is updating archetypes, specifically replacing TransViewComponent with the new PredictedMovementViewComponent while ensuring that projectiles don’t access null MovementComponents. I'll add a check in OnUpdate to handle this. 

I’m also planning to implement a new capability that sets `IsMoving` to false at the start of each frame; this will avoid flickering and ensure coherent movement state updates across ticks.
**Establishing Movement State Reset**

I need to ensure that capabilities running after the reset won't mistakenly see `IsMoving` as false. Since none currently rely on `IsMoving`, I can create a new capability called `MovementIsMovingResetCapability`. This will run at the start of each tick for entities with a MovementComponent, and it will set `IsMoving` to false if changed.

Movement sources will then set it to true when actual displacement happens. I’ll also modify `MovementComponent.Reset` to set `IsMoving` to false. Finally, I’ll ensure the new capability is registered correctly and update the todo list accordingly.</details></think>

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Evaluating movement mechanics**

I'm working on movement logic here. For speed, I should use moveComp.Speed.AsFloat(), and for rotation, I think I need to convert trans.Rotation to Quaternion and update the world rotation each frame, regardless of movement. I wonder if I should check if I'm actually moving using _isMovingLogicCached (which is set via dirty), but if there's no movement component, should I default to true? I might need an early return for projectiles too.
**Understanding movement component logic**

I need to ensure a movement component exists. First, I check if `_isMovingLogicCached` is set. If the movement component exists but hasn't updated (like on the first frame), I'll get the value from `moveComp.IsMoving`. If not moving, I handle idling by snapping to `posLogic` if needed and still updating the rotation. When moving, I compute the direction based on the position differences. If there's minimal movement, I rely on cached values. I also smooth the speed and adjust the visual position accordingly, ensuring everything is always set correctly.
**Resetting movement logic**

In the `OnReset` method, I need to ensure that `_posVisual` reflects the current position in the world. I’ll grab this from `_ownerEntityView`. If `OwnerEntity` has a `TransComponent`, I’ll update `_lastPosLogicSeen` and `_cachedDirLogic`. I’m planning to set `_speedVisual` to `_cachedSpeedLogic` to prevent acceleration spikes when the speed changes. I should also set `_lastLogicFrameSeen` appropriately. 

Additionally, I need to implement conversion methods for `TSVector` to `Vector3`, handle rotation without smoothing, and modify the `MovementComponent` to include an `IsMoving` property. I'll create a new `AstrumLogic` file to reset capabilities and ensure it inherits correctly with high priority.
**Setting movement capabilities**

I need to make sure that my reset logic runs before movement, starting with a priority of 900, which comes after Dead at 1000. I think this is a good approach because I want to handle things like knockback and other movement sources first. If an entity is dead, it might not matter as much for its movement state.

Also, I'll check if the entity needs a `MovementComponent` and a `TransComponent`. For activation and deactivation, I’ll ensure that `IsMoving` gets set to false when necessary, and I may also need to account for scenarios where the owner is missing. I'll implement these logic adjustments, but tags shouldn’t disable it since they can be empty.
**Implementing movement capabilities**

I'm working on the implementation details for movement capabilities. The `Tags` property is set up with a static readonly HashSet. In the `ShouldActivate` method, I’ll confirm whether the entity has a `MovementComponent`. During the `Tick` method, if the entity is moving, I need to mark the component as dirty; if it's already false, there's no need to do that. 

I need to ensure that if any movement changes occur—like applying displacement or skill updates—`IsMoving` gets set to true. I'll also create a helper method for setting `IsMoving` in a way that avoids duplication. 

After that, I will modify archetypes; replacing components where needed. Before compiling, I'll remember to refresh Unity, ideally using the `Assets/Refresh` call if Unity is connected. I'll make sure to read the necessary files for accurate patching before proceeding with changes.</details></think>

_**User**_

不应该有 MovementIsMovingResetCapability 这种东西，基于顺序，可以由 MoveCapability 来处理

---

_**Agent (model default, mode Agent)**_

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Refining movement handling**

The user suggests that there might be a better way to handle movement priorities in the system. I’m considering adjusting the order so that MovementCapability processes earlier, potentially allowing a reset before others are executed. I'm thinking about detecting if any displacement occurred to set IsMoving, but since MovementCapability runs last, it can use the previous values. If no movement happens, we should keep IsMoving false, but if it registered earlier, we leave it true.
**Adjusting movement state**

I need to set IsMoving to false if there's no displacement in the current frame, even if it was true before. Each frame, I want MovementCapability to reset IsMoving if needed. However, I can’t reset it if knockback or skills have set it earlier in the frame. To address this, I’ll add a LastMoveFrame to track when displacement occurs. If IsMoving is true but hasn’t changed this frame and nothing else moved, I'll set IsMoving to false. Each ability will mark the frame it set true.
**Enhancing movement tracking**

To avoid resetting the movement capability every frame, I plan to modify the MovementComponent to include an IsMovingFrame or LastMovedFrame variable for serialization. At the end of the MovementCapability Tick, I'll set IsMoving based on whether LastMovedFrame matches the current frame. I need to consider how this works for entities without MovementCapability, like projectiles, which might not need IsMoving. However, base units still have MovementComponent, so I’ll ensure it updates and finalizes movement states even if user input is off. I’ll add LastMoveFrame to the MovementComponent for tracking.
**Implementing movement tracking**

I need to create a helper method called MarkMoved that will set the LastMoveFrame in MovementComponent during displacement. Although BaseComponent doesn't reference entities, we can handle this in capabilities. When a displacement happens, I'll set IsMoving to true and update LastMoveFrame with the current frame. If IsMoving changes from false to true, I’ll mark it as dirty. At the end of each tick, if LastMoveFrame doesn't match the current frame and IsMoving is true, I'll set IsMoving to false, making sure not to clear it incorrectly when displacements have occurred.
**Managing movement state updates**

If the MovementCapability doesn’t move and there's no earlier movement, I’ll need to set LastMoveFrame possibly to the previous frame and change IsMoving to false if it was true. I'll initialize LastMoveFrame to -1 and ensure IsMoving starts as false. I also need to delete the MovementIsMovingResetCapability file. The next steps include updating MovementComponent to incorporate LastMoveFrame, implementing logic for patches, and ensuring proper frame tracking for movement and displacement, while also considering knockback scenarios. I’ll proceed with the deletions and patches in sequence.</details></think>

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Investigating build errors**

I'm finding some interesting points about building AstrumView in isolation versus in the solution. It seems the solution build might be using a different version of AstrumView.csproj since it fails with errors related to PredictedMovementViewComponent. However, when I build AstrumView alone, it succeeds. There might be stale references in the build process, or Unity defines could differ between builds. I need to untangle this to pinpoint the root cause.
**Analyzing build discrepancies**

I suspect that the solution build might be using cached project files that didn't refresh properly. While building AstrumView alone worked, the solution build fails, possibly due to a variation of BaseUnitViewArchetype.cs in a different directory. It’s tricky since type resolution shouldn’t depend on assembly references within the same project. Maybe the solution build is referencing an outdated version of the AstrumView project from the solution file, causing these issues. I need to investigate this further!
**Inspecting project files**

I think it's time to check the solution file to see if there are actually two AstrumView projects listed. A quick grep should help me confirm this. If I find duplicates, it might explain some of the inconsistencies I've been experiencing with the builds. I really want to get to the bottom of this issue, so I’m curious to see what I can uncover! Let’s see what the inspection reveals.</details></think>

## 实现要点（对应你最新约束）
- **移除** `MovementIsMovingResetCapability`（不再靠“每帧重置能力”）。
- **逻辑层**在 `MovementComponent` 增加：
  - `IsMoving`：权威移动状态（本逻辑帧是否实际发生位移）
  - `LastMoveFrame`：记录最近一次发生位移的 `World.CurFrame`，用于结算/清除上一帧残留
- **位移来源写入移动状态 + 置脏通知**：
  - `MovementCapability`：发生位移时写 `IsMoving=true` 且 `LastMoveFrame=currentFrame`；Tick 末尾若 `IsMoving==true && LastMoveFrame!=currentFrame` 则清为 `false` 并置脏
  - `KnockbackCapability` / `SkillDisplacementCapability`：发生位移时写 `LastMoveFrame=World.CurFrame`，若 `IsMoving` 从 false→true 才置脏
- **View 层**新增 `PredictedMovementViewComponent`：
  - **只在 `IsMoving=true` 时更新位置**；静止时不纠偏、不拉回
  - 逻辑帧停更但仍 `IsMoving=true`：继续按缓存的 `dirVisual/speedVisual` 惯性前进，纠偏只做**横向回轨**（避免向旧 `posLogic` 后拉）
  - 允许的唯一例外：偏差超过 `hardSnapDistance` 才硬对齐
- **装配替换**：`BaseUnitViewArchetype`、`ProjectileViewArchetype` 中把 `TransViewComponent` 替换为 `PredictedMovementViewComponent`（Projectile 会在新组件里检测 `ProjectileComponent` 后直接 no-op，避免与 `ProjectileViewComponent` 打架）。

## 涉及文件
- 逻辑层：
  - `Assets/Script/AstrumLogic/Components/MovementComponent.cs`
  - `Assets/Script/AstrumLogic/Capabilities/MovementCapability.cs`
  - `Assets/Script/AstrumLogic/Capabilities/KnockbackCapability.cs`
  - `Assets/Script/AstrumLogic/Capabilities/SkillDisplacementCapability.cs`
- 视图层：
  - `Assets/Script/AstrumView/Components/PredictedMovementViewComponent.cs`
  - `Assets/Script/AstrumView/Archetypes/Builtins/BaseUnitViewArchetype.cs`
  - `Assets/Script/AstrumView/Archetypes/Builtins/ProjectileViewArchetype.cs`

如果你接下来要把 `wLogicDirection/wCorrectionDirection/accel/posFixLerp/hardSnapDistance` 做成表驱动或在运行时可配置（现在是普通 public 字段，方便调试但不是 Inspector），我也可以继续收口到你们的配置体系里。

---

确认：项目里已经**没有** `MovementIsMovingResetCapability.cs` 了（已删除）。

现在 `IsMoving` 的生命周期完全由 `MovementCapability` 负责：
- 任一位移来源在本帧发生位移时写 `MovementComponent.LastMoveFrame = World.CurFrame`，并在 `IsMoving` 从 false→true 时置脏。
- `MovementCapability.Tick` **末尾**如果发现 `IsMoving==true` 但 `LastMoveFrame != currentFrame`，就把 `IsMoving=false` 并置脏（等价于“本帧未发生任何位移则清零”）。

---

`_hasReceivedMovingState` 本意是做“兜底”：因为你要求 **View 不主动判输入/不每帧轮询 IsMoving**，所以只靠“组件置脏→SyncDataFromComponent”来更新 `_isMovingLogicCached`。这个标志用于判断**是否至少收到过一次来自逻辑层的 IsMoving 同步**，在没收到前允许从 `MovementComponent` 读一次初始化值，避免默认 false 造成首帧不动。  
但在当前实现里我在 `OnInitialize()` 已经直接读了一次 `moveComp.IsMoving` 并把它置为 true，因此 `_hasReceivedMovingState` 现在基本是**冗余**的。

我这就把它删掉，改为：初始化时读一次 `IsMoving`，之后只在 `SyncDataFromComponent` 里更新，不再需要这个 flag。

---

`_hasReceivedMovingState` 原本是个**兜底标志**：表示“View 是否已经通过 **组件置脏同步**收到过一次 `IsMoving`”，在没收到之前允许从 `MovementComponent` 读一次，避免默认值导致首帧不动。

但在我们当前实现里：
- `OnInitialize()` 已经直接读了一次 `moveComp.IsMoving` 作为初值；
- 之后 `IsMoving` 只需要靠 `SyncDataFromComponent` 更新；

所以 `_hasReceivedMovingState` 实际上**没有必要**。

我已经把它从 `PredictedMovementViewComponent` 里删掉，并重新编译 `AstrumProj.sln` 通过。

---

_**User**_

现在还需要处理技能位移时的表现。你看原版 的 TransviewCOmponent 里就有相关逻辑。现在讨论一下，是跟之前的一样，在 同一个 view 里按不同模式处理呢，还是分到另一个 view 里处理？

---

_**Agent (model default, mode Plan)**_

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Exploring skill displacement visuals**

The user wants to handle skill displacement visuals and mentions that the old design used animator.deltaPosition for visual offset, but now there’s a new rule to update position only when IsMoving is true. During skill displacement, MovementComponent.IsMoving is set to true, which makes sense. I wonder if visuals should include animator root motion along with predicted movement. There are two options for implementation, considering conflicts between components and ensuring a single writer.
**Considering component complexity**

I'm analyzing two options for handling skill displacement visuals. One option is a single, complex component that depends on Animator/AnimationViewComponent and ActionComponent, which seems a bit convoluted. The other option is to create a separate PredictedMovementViewComponent for base movement and a SkillDisplacementViewComponent for skill-specific offsets. This approach would need to manage position settings and coordination, especially around updating logic in the update order of components. It’s definitely feasible but requires careful thought on implementation.
**Clarifying control over components**

I’m thinking about how to control the order in the archetype list by adding PredictedMovementViewComponent first, followed by RootMotionSkillViewComponent. The latter would apply the final transform. One option is for the root motion to no-op on other frames, allowing the predicted view to apply first. The user asked whether they want a single view for different modes or separate ones, and I need to clarify if they prefer root motion-based visuals, like in the original TransViewComponent. Their preference for the "static rule" during skill is also worth confirming.
**Planning architecture questions**

I’m looking into how the existing AnimationViewComponent uses Animancer and applies root motion, which works when it's enabled. The old TransViewComponent had a method for determining visual follow modes based on skills used. I need to plan a discussion with the user and ask a couple of critical questions about their preferred architecture: whether they want a single component or separate layered components. I'll briefly outline the tradeoffs and include my recommendation for a single component mode switch. Then, I’ll await their choice!
**Formulating critical questions**

I'm thinking about asking the user about skill displacement visuals. Specifically, I want to know whether they prefer using the root motion offset from Animator.deltaPosition, similar to TransViewComponent, or if they want to follow position purely. Instead of asking two separate questions, I could combine them into a single multi-question form that addresses both the architecture choice and the root motion source. I'll use the AskQuestion tool to get their input on these critical aspects.</details></think>

---

现在要把“技能位移（SkillDisplacement）时的表现”补上，本质是：在技能动作期间，让视图从 **普通预测移动**切到 **RootMotion/技能位移表现**，同时仍以逻辑位置为权威、不穿帮。实现上两条路都行：**同一个 ViewComponent 内做模式切换**，或**拆成第二个只负责技能 RootMotion 的 ViewComponent（并用装配顺序覆盖最终位置）**。  
为了不走偏，我先确认你更倾向哪种结构，以及技能位移表现是否要复用 `TransViewComponent` 里那套 `Animator.deltaPosition` 逻辑。

{
  "plan": "# 技能位移表现（RootMotion）集成计划\n\n## 目标\n在不新增额外 ViewComponent 的前提下，把技能位移期间的表现逻辑集成进 &#96;PredictedMovementViewComponent&#96;：\n- 技能动作期间：使用 &#96;Animator.deltaPosition&#96; 作为视觉偏移来源（参考原 &#96;TransViewComponent&#96; 的 RootMotion 逻辑）\n- 保持逻辑权威位置：最终位置 = &#96;posLogic + visualOffset&#96;\n- 继续遵守既有约束：\n  - &#96;IsMoving=false&#96; 时不更新位置（除 &#96;hardSnapDistance&#96; 例外）\n  - 逻辑帧停更但 &#96;IsMoving=true&#96; 时继续惯性前进，纠偏不后拉\n\n## 需要修改的文件\n- **实现**：&#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Components/PredictedMovementViewComponent.cs&#96;\n- **参考逻辑**（不改动，仅参考）：&#96;AstrumProj/Assets/Script/AstrumView/Components/TransViewComponent.cs&#96;\n\n## 设计\n\n### 1) 在 PredictedMovementViewComponent 增加模式判定\n在 &#96;OnUpdate&#96; 内读取逻辑层 &#96;ActionComponent&#96;：\n- 若 &#96;actionComponent.CurrentAction?.SkillExtension != null&#96;（与 &#96;TransViewComponent.DetermineVisualFollowMode&#96; 一致），则进入 &#96;SkillRootMotion&#96; 模式；否则使用现有 &#96;NormalPredict&#96;。\n\n### 2) RootMotion 偏移维护（核心）\n新增内部状态：\n- &#96;Vector3 _visualOffset&#96;：累计的视觉偏移（用于叠加在 &#96;posLogic&#96; 上）\n- &#96;int _lastAppliedLogicFrame&#96;：用于判断逻辑帧是否推进\n\n在 &#96;SkillRootMotion&#96; 模式下：\n- 读取 Animator：优先从 &#96;AnimationViewComponent&#96; 获取（与 &#96;TransViewComponent.GetAnimator()&#96; 相同思路），fallback 为 &#96;OwnerEntityView.GameObject.GetComponent&lt;Animator&gt;()&#96;\n- 每帧读取 &#96;animDelta = animator.deltaPosition&#96;\n- 逻辑帧推进时：\n  - 根据 &#96;posLogic&#96; 的跳变更新/重算 &#96;_visualOffset&#96;（沿用 &#96;TransViewComponent.UpdateVisualFollowRootMotion&#96; 的“插值到当前逻辑点并转成 offset”的思路）\n- 逻辑帧停更时：\n  - 继续按上一次 &#96;dirVisual/speedVisual&#96; 惯性前进（保持你已有规则）\n  - 同时叠加 &#96;animDelta&#96; 到 &#96;_visualOffset&#96;（可乘 &#96;motionBlendWeight&#96;，默认 1）\n  - 纠偏只做“横向回轨”：对 &#96;posLogic - (posVisual)&#96; 的平行分量剔除，避免把角色往回拉\n\n最终位置写入：\n- &#96;finalPos = posLogic + _visualOffset&#96;\n- 仍按 &#96;hardSnapDistance&#96; 做极端保护：当 &#96;|finalPos - posLogic|&#96; 或 &#96;|finalPos - 当前渲染位置|&#96; 过大时重置 &#96;_visualOffset = Vector3.zero&#96;\n\n### 3) 与 IsMoving 的关系\n- 仍以 &#96;MovementComponent.IsMoving&#96; 为开关：\n  - &#96;IsMoving=false&#96;：不更新位置（不应用 RootMotion 偏移），除非触发 &#96;hardSnapDistance&#96;\n  - &#96;IsMoving=true&#96;：允许进入 RootMotion 模式并更新\n\n### 4) OnReset 行为\n延续你的要求：OnReset 不瞬移对齐。\n- 重置 RootMotion 状态：&#96;_visualOffset = Vector3.zero&#96;、缓存帧号更新\n\n## 实施步骤（Todos）\n- **impl-skill-rootmotion-mode**：在 &#96;PredictedMovementViewComponent&#96; 增加 SkillRootMotion 模式与 Animator 获取逻辑。\n- **port-rootmotion-offset**：迁移并简化 &#96;TransViewComponent.UpdateVisualFollowRootMotion&#96; 的 offset 维护到新组件。\n- **keep-freeze-frame-rule**：在逻辑帧停更时，保持惯性前进 + 横向纠偏，同时叠加 animDelta。\n- **compile-sln**：编译 &#96;AstrumProj/AstrumProj.sln&#96;，修复新增错误；必要时执行 &#96;Assets/Refresh&#96;。",
  "name": "技能位移表现",
  "overview": "在 PredictedMovementViewComponent 内新增 SkillRootMotion 模式：技能动作期间用 Animator.deltaPosition 产生视觉偏移，逻辑位置仍为权威，并保留逻辑帧停更时惯性前进与横向纠偏规则。"
